name: Chunk Miner
description:
It's time to mine your way up the block chain! Chunk Miner is a mining game with an addictive mining-simple gameplay and multiple ways to upgrade your mining empire. Dig deep into the ground and find ores, and unknown blocks. Upgrade your tools and purchase some helpers using your hard-earned resources. Race against your friends to be the best miner on the block.

Reviews:

its cool, 9 outta 10 - a tester

the game is actually pretty cool! 7/10 - a tester

yeah this is fun honestly, 10/10 - a tester

This is not an official Minecraft game. This was not approved by or associated with Mojang Studios.
